content:
Stanford Court offers over 2,100 square feet of event venues, including communal workspaces. For business dinners that won’t bore you, the Nob Hill outpost of Seven Stills puts locally crafted small batch whiskeys within close reach. 

  • Plug & Play AudioVisual Technology
  • 2100 sq ft of Event space
  • Semi Private spaces
  • Concierge Service

Learn more about our Corporate Preferred Program here.
